mapper.select: SELECT p.* ,b.`name` as brand_name,c.`name` as classify_name from product p LEFT JOIN brand b on b.id =p.brand_id LEFT join classify c on c.id =p.classify_id where p.`name`=#{name}
SELECT p.* ,b.`name` as brand_name,c.`name` as classify_name from product p LEFT JOIN brand b on b.id =p.brand_id LEFT join classify c on c.id =p.classify_id where p.id=#{id}
SELECT p.* ,b.`name` as brand_name,c.`name` as classify_name from product p LEFT JOIN brand b on b.id =p.brand_id LEFT join classify c on c.id =p.classify_id where p.id IN (${ids})
